resources.string:
Thanks for choosing iMooie multifunction IPL beauty 
device technology,iMooie use advanced intense pulsed 
light "IPL" filter out harmful light and invalid light to 
keep effective light according to three 
different functions and could achieve hair removal, 
skin rejuvenation and acne clearance by changing different function lamps. 

This product with efficient, fashion, technology, health 
as the foundation of enterprise development, choosing 
iMooie IPL means that you construct a privacy beauty 
salon. It is beginning of beauty, In order to get the 
better effect for iMooie IPL, We suggest you view user 
manual carefully using and safe keep this user manual, 
you can install the iMooie App for Android and Apple 
iOS systems to help us step by step.

Replace the current lamp with the acne treatment 
lamp. 
Clean any makeup and cream from the treated area 
before start using the device. 
Connect the iMooie host device with the electricity 
using the power adaptor 220V 50/60HZ. 

Turn on the power button 
and wait for the LED light to be on. 
Test the skin tone color by using the built-in sensor of 
the device as the above image
Body with ergonomic design, light \nweight, compact, smart look.
Contact skin sensor (no light \nshooting if not touch skin well).
